## 2: Guessing Game 🎯

a)  Answer the following guessing questions, each in its own line:
    1)  How many liters of Beer have been drunken at the Oktoberfest in Munich in 2019? 🍻 3600000
    2)  How many people live in Karlsruhe? (Exactly) 🏘️ 452768
    3)  What percentage of Americans asked in a survey in 2017, indicated that they believe in Astrology? 🌟 13%
